projects.title: MicroService - ecommerce store
projects.description: Simple ecommerce store app built with microservices-based architecture. Technical Stack includes golang(gin), react(nextjs, tailwindCSS), rabbitMQ, GRPC, and docker.

projects.title: Slack Clone
projects.description: This slack clone project provides token-based authentication and a real-time chat room. Users can create a workspace and invite other users to join.

projects.title: Netflix Clone
projects.description: This netflix project provides token-based authentication. User can watch videos provided by youtube api.

projects.title: Markdown Editor
projects.description: A Markdown Editor app using Next.js, Supabase, and TailwindCSS.

projects.title: Travel Map
projects.description: Travel map app provides restaurants, attractions, and hotel searching services based on the given location.
